title: Tetragon Observability Stack Configuration
description: Values schema for the Tetragon Observability Stack Helm chart

global.description: Global configuration shared across all components

otelGatewayEndpoint.description: OpenTelemetry Gateway endpoint (host:port) for forwarding telemetry data

clusterName.description: Kubernetes cluster name for resource attribution and filtering

otelGatewayTLS.description: TLS configuration for connecting to OTel Gateway

insecure.description: Skip TLS verification (not recommended for production)
